org.kynosarges.tektosyne.geometry

Class Angle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kynosarges.tektosyne.geometry.Angle

  • public final class Angle
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides constants and methods to manipulate angles in radians and degrees.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEGREES_TO_RADIANS
      The factor that converts an angle from degrees to radians.
      static double RADIANS_TO_DEGREES
      The factor that converts an angle from radians to degrees.

      Finds the shortest distance between two specified normalized angles, in radians.

      Normalizes the specified angle in degrees to the interval [0, 360).
      static double normalizeRadians(double radians)
      Normalizes the specified angle in radians to the interval [0, 2 Math.PI).
      static int normalizeRoundedDegrees(double degrees)
      Normalizes the specified angle in degrees to the interval [0, 360), after rounding to the nearest Integer.

    • Field Detail

      • DEGREES_TO_RADIANS

        public static final double DEGREES_TO_RADIANS
        The factor that converts an angle from degrees to radians. Holds the value Math.PI / 180.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RADIANS_TO_DEGREES

        public static final double RADIANS_TO_DEGREES
        The factor that converts an angle from radians to degrees. Holds the value 180 / Math.PI.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • degreesToCompass

        public static Compass degreesToCompass(double degrees)
        Converts the specified angle in degrees to the nearest Compass point.
        Parameters:
        degrees - the angle in degrees to convert. This value is taken Fortran.modulo(double, double) 360 degrees, and may therefore lie outside the interval [0, 360).
        Returns:
        the Compass point nearest the specified degrees

      • distanceDegrees

        public static double distanceDegrees(double start,
                                     double end)
        Finds the shortest distance between two specified normalized angles, in degrees. Both specified angles must be normalized to the half-open interval [0, 360), e.g. using normalizeDegrees(double). If so, distanceDegrees returns the value within the half-open interval (-180, 180] that solves the following equation: end = normalizeDegrees(double)(start + distanceDegrees(start, end))
        Parameters:
        start - the angle from which the distance is measured, in normalized degrees
        end - the angle to which the distance is measured, in normalized degrees
        Returns:
        the shortest distance between start and end, in signed degrees

      • distanceRadians

        public static double distanceRadians(double start,
                                     double end)
        Finds the shortest distance between two specified normalized angles, in radians. Both specified angles must be normalized to the half-open interval [0, 2 Math.PI), e.g. using normalizeRadians(double). If so, distanceRadians returns the value within the half-open interval (-Math.PI, Math.PI] that solves the following equation: end = normalizeRadians(double)(start + distanceRadians(start, end))
        Parameters:
        start - the angle from which the distance is measured, in normalized radians
        end - the angle to which the distance is measured, in normalized radians
        Returns:
        the shortest distance between start and end, in signed radians

      • normalizeDegrees

        public static double normalizeDegrees(double degrees)
        Normalizes the specified angle in degrees to the interval [0, 360).
        Parameters:
        degrees - the angle in degrees to normalize
        Returns:
        the specified degrees normalized to the half-open interval [0, 360)

      • normalizeRoundedDegrees

        public static int normalizeRoundedDegrees(double degrees)
        Normalizes the specified angle in degrees to the interval [0, 360), after rounding to the nearest Integer. Uses Fortran.nint(double) to round degrees before normalization. The result is guaranteed to be an Integer value within [0, 359].
        Parameters:
        degrees - the angle in degrees to normalize
        Returns:
        the specified degrees rounded to the nearest Integer and normalized to the half-open interval [0, 360)
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - if degrees overflows Integer

      • normalizeRadians

        public static double normalizeRadians(double radians)
        Normalizes the specified angle in radians to the interval [0, 2 Math.PI).
        Parameters:
        radians - the angle in radians to normalize
        Returns:
        the specified radians normalized to the half-open interval [0, 2 Math.PI)
